long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MyVoIP API integration platform providing database driven screen pops. The MyVoIP app integrates with back-office applications using APIs (Salesforce.com, Zendesk, ect.) By leveraging API's MyVoIP extension will search any interal database and present the findings in a new window. The MyVoIP app also recognizes any phone number presented in Google Chrome and transforms it into a clickable link for seamless click to dial.
